description: This is a HTML cheatsheet to help your learn fast the web development. You will find in this page the main structure of a web page and a list of the most used tags
title: HTML cheatsheet tutorial

content:
Websites are composed of 3 main elements : HTML, Javascript and CSS.
 HTML: defines the base of the website without any style or interaction. Javscript: makes the website dynamic and interactive. CSS: gives the style to the website.  This website has a series of tutorials that will help you understand the web development.
As you go through the tutorials, try to apply them by writing the code by yourself
ecessary information to understand how create a simple website.
Tutorials:
 Html tutorial
title: Web development tutorial for beginners

content:
Master of Software and Network Engineering at INSA de Toulouse. I specialize in Internet Of Things (IoT). Software FullStack Engineer, DevOps and Mobile Developer. I am very passionated by new technologies, curious and always motivated.
Achievements  Android application : +100,000 downloads  Backend :  Languages: Go lang, Java ,C, python, NodeJs MessageQueue : RabbitMq Relational Database : MongoDB, MySql, PostgreSql Graph Database : Neo4j  DevOps :  provisioning : Ansible, Salt Stack, Puppet virtualization : Vagrant , Docker Scalability : HaProxy , confd, Creation of Micro-Services Discovery : etcd Orchestration : Kubernetes  Frontend :  HTML5 ,JS, CSS Mobile : Ionic, Angularjs, ReactJs, Native (java) Framework : Bootstrap, Material Design UI / UX  Data Science and Big Data :  Machine Learning : R, H2o Data’s Features Extraction Data cleaning Behavior Detection ( Prediction )
title: About me
